thread.title: Say What? Maroon 5 In Talks To Headline Super Bowl 50 Halftime Show
thread.title_full: Say What? Maroon 5 In Talks To Headline Super Bowl 50 Halftime Show

title: Say What? Maroon 5 In Talks To Headline Super Bowl 50 Halftime Show
text: Posted Thursday, October 22nd 2015 @ 9am Heads up, Team Adam Levine . Your favorite "Voice" coach and the Maroon 5 gang might be coming to Super Bowl 50. Well, that's according to a source close to E! News . { "position1" : { "type" : "artist", "id" : 40523, "name" : "Maroon 5" } } On Wednesday (October 21), it was reported that the sextet a re currently in "extensive talks" with the NFL to serve as entertainment for the mega-sports event. Even though other names have been tossed across the table like Coldplay and Bruno Mars (who performed during the 2015 game), Adam and company are said to be the front-runners for the gig. If Maroon 5 lock down the coveted spot, they'll need to up their game, considering 2016 marks the Super Bowl's 50th year anniversary. The game takes place at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, California and will air on CBS. On other another, who's bringing the nachos? Photo: Getty Images
